html:
2026-0039
2026-01-26VACVeterans Review and Appeal Board ActReappointment of a permanent member of the Veterans Review and Appeal BoardReappointment of Richard Thibault of Stratford, Prince Edward Island, as a permanent member of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and his designation as Deputy Chairperson, for a term ending December 31, 2026.N/A
act: Veterans Review and Appeal Board Act
subject: Reappointment of a permanent member of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board
precis: Reappointment of Richard Thibault of Stratford, Prince Edward Island, as a permanent member of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and his designation as Deputy Chairperson, for a term ending December 31, 2026.
